ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I have chosen you, so listen well to what is revealed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I have chosen you, so listen to what is revealed to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: I Myself have chosen you; therefore, give ear to what is revealed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I have chosen you as My Messengers. Listen to the revelation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And I have chosen you, therefore listen carefully to what is divinely revealed to you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And I have chosen you. So listen to that which will be revealed (to you)"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And I have chosen you, so listen to what is revealed:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: I Myself have chosen thee; therefore give thou ear to this revelation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And I have chosen thee, so hearken unto that which is inspired.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: I have chosen you. So listen to what is being revealed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And I! I have chosen thee hearken thou then to that which shall be revealed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: I have chosen you; so listen to what is revealed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: I have chosen thee: listen, then, to the inspiration (sent to thee).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And I have chosen you. So listen to that which is inspired to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: I have chosen you. Therefore, listen to what shall be revealed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: I have chosen you, so listen to what is revealed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And I have chosen you, so listen to what is revealed [to you].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:13] And I [Myself] have chosen you, from among [all of] your people, so listen to what is being revealed, to you from Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And I have chosen thee) to carry the message to Pharaoh, (so hearken unto that which is inspired) so act upon that which you have been commanded.
